Reclaimed Lumber Supply

We specialize in providing a unique line-up of reclaimed lumber to the Rocky Mountain region. Call us today to make your next project a one-of-a-kind masterpiece that will last for generations.

Let's Work Together

True Reclaimed was formed with the purpose of preserving our forests and giving wood that would have been thrown away a new purpose. We pride ourselves in bringing a unique and sustainable line-up of lumber products to homeowners, builders, and contractors.

Reclaimed Lumber Supply

Our passion for giving existing wood a new life is the driving force behind True Reclaimed Lumber. We travel all over the country and hand pick the materials we supply out of Colorado. This gives us the opportunity to bring the best pieces back to our shop and turn them into something great.

Rough Cut Lumber

Supplying reclaimed lumber isn't just about salvaging lumber from old structures. Lumber can be reclaimed in log form as well.  We work with local loggers to source trees that have been cut down to maintain healthy Colorado forests and mill these into usable lumber. Using local Colorado lumber is a great way to support our local economy and environment. 

Mobile Sawmill Services

Our mill allows us to cut a large variety of products ranging from 34-inch-wide slabs, up to 20-foot-long beams, live edge lumber, or any special dimension that the job might call for. Our mobile mill service is a great option for homeowners or contractors who have trees on their property that they want to use for a custom project.

Contractor Supply

We are proud to work with many of Colorado’s finest builders. True Reclaimed provides rough or finished products for contractors giving them materials that are easy to use at a great price. We understand the building process and want to make buying and ordering these products as simple as possible. Use us as a resource for your next commercial and residential project.
